==Walkthrough==
# Burn the vines with a Pyro attack.
#* One may also walk around it.
# Align a symbol to open a hole in the wall.
#* Stand at the glowing spot.
# Defeat some Cryo Slimes to open a door.{{Enemy List|Large Cryo Slime;Cryo Slime*4}}
#* Reinforcements:{{Enemy List|Large Cryo Slime;Cryo Slime}}
# Defeat a Cryo Abyss Mage and some Hilichurls.{{Enemy List|Cryo Abyss Mage;Hilichurl Fighter*2;Wooden Shield Hilichurl Guard*2}}
# Activate the Fire Totem with a Pyro attack and glide upwards using the wind current.
# Align a symbol to open a hole in the wall.
#* Stand at the glowing spot again.
# Burn the vines with a Pyro attack.
#* One may also walk around it too.
# Bring the blue orb to one of the two lamps below.
# Go through the hole to bring another blue orb to the other lamp. This opens the door.
#* There is an '''Exquisite Chest''' here, behind the blue orb.
# Defeat Hilichurls, Samachurl, and 2 Mitachurls in the next area.
#* Wave 1:{{Enemy List|Dendro Samachurl;Hilichurl Shooter*2;Wooden Shield Hilichurl Guard*2}}
#* Wave 2:{{Enemy List|Wooden Shieldwall Mitachurl*2}}
#* There is a '''Common Chest''' here, behind some wooden crates.
# Activate the device to open the door.
# Grab the blue orb and head south through the door with the spider.
#* Do not bring the orb to the lamp yet.
# Follow the circular path into the water and return to the previous room, which contains another blue orb.
# Bring both blue orbs to the lamps to open the door.
# Go through the door to start a cutscene.
# Jump off the cliff into the water and follow the path.
#* There is an '''Exquisite Chest''' just before the stairs.
# Go up the stairs to the ceremony site.
#* There is a '''Common Chest''' here, to the east of the tree.
# Go to the top of the ceremony site to start a cut scene.
# Talk to Hu Tao.
#* A '''Precious Chest''' appears before the exit.
